$schema.description: The path to the schema file.

templates.description: Top-level template category (e.g., backend, database, orm, repo, extras, etc.).

additionalProperties.description: Target destination path for this context glob.

^[a-zA-Z0-9_.-]+\\.hbs$.description: Map of context globs (e.g., 'single.*', 'turborepo.*', '*', etc.) to destination paths.

^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+$.description: Template subcategories (e.g., frameworks, database engines, etc.).
